description:
Yamato takes Rock and Tsukumo to Building 5 for training.
Rock challenges Samon to a duel, but he is defeated by only one finger.
The warden gathers all the supervising officers before she leaves for her business trip.
Nimaijita, the deputy supervisor of Building 2, blames Samon that Nanba Prison’s reputation is ruined because of what happened in Building 5 in the past.
Unable to take it any longer, Samon leaves the room. 
This is because someone important to Samon is related to this incident.
Source: crunchyroll
